content:
I have been trying to run jupyter on a CGD machine (tungsten) with the help of Isla to try to use data she has over there. I am having password issue when we try to do the tunneling between my laptop and tungsten. We are really stuck. Does someone have expertise on running jupyter on tungsten (or andre).
Thanks
Are you using the VPN to get behind the CGD firewall, or are you sshing to tungsten via goldhill?
I would strongly recommend using the VPN and also using jupyter-forward to set up the tunneling; I'm happy to help walk you through setting up jupyter-forward if you'd like

@Michael Levy
I would love to if you can walk me thru the steps.
